metadata.title: CVE-2018-16870 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
It was found that wolfssl before 3.15.7 is vulnerable to a new variant ofthe Bleichenbacher attack to perform downgrade attacks against TLS. Thismay lead to leakage of sensible data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16870` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl19 - 4.1.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
